channel.title: Super mario world (Rom Hack)
channel.description:
I have made another rom hack and posted it here before, but that was just one crappy level..
Anyway here is the new one!
Please give feedback, i have done up to the first castle.
http://www.4shared.com/file/105792031/779062e3/lordbost.html
[img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/8201/supermarioworld00000.png[/img]
you will need a emulator like Znes or snes9x
Remember to use savestates
